mapper.select: SELECT tb_returnlog.rlid, u1.username as returnee, tb_property.pname, u2.username as reviewer, tb_returnlog.time, tb_returnlog.number, tb_property.spec, tb_returnlog.`status`, tb_returnlog.img_src, tb_returnlog.remark FROM tb_returnlog LEFT JOIN tb_user u1 ON u1.uid = tb_returnlog.uid1 LEFT JOIN tb_user u2 ON u2.uid = tb_returnlog.uid2 LEFT JOIN tb_property ON tb_property.pid = tb_returnlog.pid ${ew.customSqlSegment}
